item.title: Introduction
item.author: wenhan002@e.ntu.edu.sg (Wenhan Yu)
item.description: Self-introduction Hello, this is Wenhan Yu, currently a third year Ph.D in Nanyang Techonological University (NTU), Singapore. My research interest coversï¼š Wireless communications Deep Reinforcement Learning Optimization Metaverse. Pursuing a Ph.D. is a lengthy journey filled with challenges and moments of joy. As an “undergraduate-to-PhD” student, I am sincerely grateful to my supervisor and all my team mates for their guidance and support. I am constantly learning new things from them and appreciate their contributions to my academic and personal growth.
